1.23.0.1 (08-04-2021)
Adds vampires to RimWorld.
Heavily inspired by Vampire the Masquerade, this mod introduces a disease known as vampirism. There are five Vampire bloodlines included with the mod currently. Different bloodlines have different abilities: over 50! Adds in "vitae" and blood mechanics (check the needs menu).
REQUIRES JECSTOOLS TO PLAY
Avilable languages: English, Spanish (by Daru), and Russian (by kr33man)
